The researchers will develop a precise, mathematical description of this “language leak” by having a computer simulate its causes and consequences. More information 2022 - 2026 Enabling multilingual eye-tracking data collection for human and machine language processing research. This EU COST Action aims to develop a large multilingual eye tracking corpus and enable researchers to collect data by sharing infrastructure and their knowledge between various fields, including linguistics, psychology, and computer science.
